extendedInfo.description: For mobile devices and tablets. Android 2.2+ firmware required. Calm Radio's new Version 6 comes with over 130 member-only channels (without commercials) and over 100 free non-member channels (with commercials)** A Calm Radio membership subscription is required for commercial-free listening.NOW with Calm Radio's unique MultiMix feature. Mix music and AtmospheresBecome a member for a low fee and get access to over 100 commercial-free channels including our Atmosphere channels, specially designed for sleep, concentration and for ringing-in-the-ear sufferers.Acoustic - Solo Piano, Solo Piano & Guitar, Solo Guitar, Blues, Folk, Christian Classical - Beethoven, Bach, Mozart, Concertos, Chamber music and moreâ¦. 27 channels World - Celtic, Native, Flamenco, Bollywood, Latin and more - 12 channelsRelaxation - OM, Reiki, Spa, Positivity, Lounge, Spaced, Healing and moreJazz - Just Jazz, Be Bob, Big Band, Jazz Piano and moreAtmospheres - Great for sleeping, tinnitus sufferers, concentrationFavorites featureSleep and Wake Timers3 audio qualities: High 192K, Medium 128K and Low 64KLarge album cover art and Now Playing and recent tracks infoAtmosphere channels mixing (members only)We get so many great reviews from listeners who say Calm Radio is by far their favorite station on the internet.â Read our listener feedback***** Calm Radio helps drown out the trains that go by with loads of coal bound for and from China and Russia. We're in Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia and it's a place that cries out for calm. Best wishes for a happy and bright Christmas season. K Van Der Stoep***** This collection of music and your service is one of the best 'things' that ever happened in my life. 40 years of practicing medicine has left its imprint on my psyche...'wound up like a $2 watch' might be an apt descriptor. You help that. Thank you. M Daly***** You amaze me! You keep finding ways to improve. I love the new channel menu as well as the many new channels. Eric Harry & Calm Radio you just keep getting better! I think this is the first time I've ever written two letters of appreciation to a company. I can't help it. You keep getting better. You are the most welcome part of my work day. Thanks! Maggie A.***** Just letting you know we're getting Calm Radio crystal clear down here in the beautiful Golden Bay area of the South Island of New Zealand. I love the music stream and have just signed up for a 12 month VIP subscription. Ken***** Spa/ambient channel is the best! Has helped me a great deal with my anxiety. Gena from Lodi CA***** THANK YOU! - for everything... can't tell you what a difference "CalmRadio" has made - it has saved my sanity these past few weeks - especially the "SLEEP" channel has - helped met to cope and find moments of peace.***** I have to say that I am still amazed at your near instantaneous response! I have never had ANYONE answer a support request in such a timely - but more importantly, personal - and HELPFUL - manner! Nancy***** You're my parrot's favorite station when I'm away at work! Carrie..Portland OR***** Thank you a million times over for your radio station. Every type of music that I absolutely love is available any where I am at any time. You have to be the very best provider of music anywhere. Carol Lee***** This is the best "music to work by" that I have found! I'm an at-home "virtual lawyer". D. Scardilli, Absecon NJ

reviews.title: Nice app, but need improvements
reviews.comment: -This app is indeed very good when it decides to work.  The music selection is very impressive but sometimes  you don\'t know what are you listening  ( maybe needs a notification icon ?).  -The audio quality is decent, and is better when  you have a subscription.  - The interface needs a new style, the actual is very cheap.  At the end you will be loving this radio station, despite the random crashes.
reviews.author: Andres Jaramillo

reviews.title: From unrest to peace
reviews.comment: Truly calm radio has drastically made changes to my life. Being a doctor and stressed out to the core I found this 2 yrs ago. Most beautiful way to relax at heart. Thank u
reviews.author: raja abhilash

reviews.title: Just OK.
reviews.comment: Thought it would be better getting the app rather than listening to the stations on TuneIn but its crap. Still has ads & can\'t access half of the stations unless your a \'VIP\' (paying customer). Deleting it & going back to listening to their channels on TuneIn.
reviews.author: Natasa Rusit

reviews.title: great
reviews.comment: great
reviews.author: Sean Scholes

reviews.title: Always
reviews.comment: Perfect sound always. Genuine peace.
reviews.author: Jobette jobette

reviews.title: Very disappointed
reviews.comment: Simply doesn\'t work on Galaxy S3 with 4.1 Recent upgrade has made no difference - still doesn\'t work.
reviews.author: Martin Gaffney

reviews.title: Great selection and flawless app.
reviews.comment: I joined also. Fantastic variety and really high quality sound. My faves are Solo Piano and Solo Guitar and Sleep.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on my S3 either
reviews.comment: I was hoping so much this would give me peaceful nights but alas, all was hopeful. Kept giving me streaming and network error all the time!
reviews.author: Jasmine Ong

reviews.title: doesn\'t play on my S3.
reviews.comment: This app would never play on my Samsung galaxy S3 4.1.2. Gives me this \'Error connecting to stream\' all the time. Love this radio, bought 2yr subscription. Same s#!\302\243 logging in, logging out. Plays on my wife\'s S2 though.
reviews.author: Denis Panov

reviews.title: Can\'t listen to anything
reviews.comment: What is wrong with this? I had account and can\'t login; changed password and still can\'t login. Tried to listen to stations like nature and says vip only - what\'s the point of having this if I can\'t get even one station from each category?
reviews.author: michelle murphy

reviews.title: Love It!
reviews.comment: I love this app and I have Pandorka and Sky.fm and the new torch music, but this one is the best. I listen to Persian Radio alot!
reviews.author: Eric Aerts

reviews.title: CalmRadio: cool mode 24/7
reviews.comment: It works perfectly in the UAE (Emirates), it heals me from all the stress, and it keeps me in different world and in different mood. I use it in galaxy S4, S4 mini Zoom, iphone 4, 4S, 5 & ipad 1+.
reviews.author: Yousef Alblooshi

reviews.title: Facebook button
reviews.comment: I wish I could share it via the facebook button but it will not gives me error every time. Love the app though
reviews.author: Mandy Black

reviews.title: Speculator, love it!
reviews.comment: This one is the best one by far!
reviews.author: Tondya Kooiker

reviews.title: Music is nice.
reviews.comment: The music is nice but when I quit the application it still throws up a currently playing screen on the log on screen of my nexus7.
reviews.author: Matthew Smith

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: The most relaxing music on this app it\'s a must download
reviews.author: Gaberiel Eady

reviews.title: Tried this one
reviews.comment: Tried the others, then went back to this one, and uninstalled the others. :-)
reviews.author: Jo Bo

reviews.title: Tried it but wasn\'t
reviews.comment: Happy about the performance it seem to skip every 2 sec and I wish they had a 10 day full access trial to see if it worked well, as for me, nope uninstall doesn\'t seem like good service without knowing if it works.
reviews.author: Simon H

reviews.title: Great idea, not quite there yet
reviews.comment: I want to love this app. The underlying idea, gentle streams of soothing sounds and music, is very appealing. Calm Radio has the best selection of any similar app but still needs work. Put an icon in the Status Bar to remind you its running and make it easy to access. Separate basic controls (volume, timer, play/pause) from all that FB/Twitter button junk. Control buttons w/ white indicators should never have white backgrounds. Add an indicator that tells you a stream is loading not stalled. Close to great.
reviews.author: Warren Henderson

reviews.title: Keeps crashing
reviews.comment: HTC One X int. 4.1.1 Keeps closing randomly. Please fix.
reviews.author: Yerkin Kubenkulov
